about_the_game:
Little remains of the world we know today. The mysterious machines of ARC threaten any possible settlement on the surface and communities are forced below the ground to survive.
Most people are content just to see another day.

Others have chosen a bolder path. They are known as Raiders.

THE GAME
ARC Raiders is a multiplayer extraction adventure, offering high-tension gameplay in an immersive world layered with mystery.

ENLIST.RESIST
Enlist as a Raider and thrive in a desolate world. Shape your legacy as you scavenge the lethal surface and build your home in the underground neighborhood of Speranza. But beware of the machines. Beware of Raiders praying on others. Build relationships with traders as you carry out quests and return from the surface with valuable loot. Trade it for gear and crucial upgrades to your den. But nothing worth having is for free.

What are you willing to do to get what you want?
